title: Thomas the Skeptic and the Spiritual Multiplication of Jesus
description:
Jesus seems to show up to randos. We'd prefer a press conference or a super-hero-movie showdown. Jesus doesn't make this move. Instead he appears to the people he wants to appear to and begins a process of multiplication of himself by sending the Spirit of God. John 20
Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/MZyXFVc6

Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/
